omopColumns.name: nhs_number
omopColumns.query:
select distinct
				apc.NHSNumber,
				apc.HospitalProviderSpellNumber,
				cc.CriticalCareStartDate as VisitStartDate,
				coalesce(cc.CriticalCareStartTime, '000000') as VisitStartTime,
				cc.CriticalCarePeriodDischargeDate as VisitEndDate,
				coalesce(cc.CriticalCarePeriodDischargeTime, '000000') as VisitEndTime
		from omop_staging.sus_CCMDS cc
		inner join omop_staging.sus_APC apc on cc.GeneratedRecordID = apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier
		where apc.NHSNumber is not null

omopColumns.name: HospitalProviderSpellNumber

dataSource.name: HospitalProviderSpellNumber
dataSource.description: CDS specific hospital spell number that binds many episodes together.

omopColumns.query:
select distinct
				apc.NHSNumber,
				apc.HospitalProviderSpellNumber,
				cc.CriticalCareStartDate as VisitStartDate,
				coalesce(cc.CriticalCareStartTime, '000000') as VisitStartTime,
				cc.CriticalCarePeriodDischargeDate as VisitEndDate,
				coalesce(cc.CriticalCarePeriodDischargeTime, '000000') as VisitEndTime
		from omop_staging.sus_CCMDS cc
		inner join omop_staging.sus_APC apc on cc.GeneratedRecordID = apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier
		where apc.NHSNumber is not null

omopColumns.name: visit_detail_start_date

dataSource.name: VisitStartDate
dataSource.description: Start date of the episode, if exists, else the start date of the spell.

omopColumns.query:

omopColumns.name: visit_detail_start_datetime
omopColumns.operation_description: Combines a date with a time of day.

dataSource.name: VisitStartDate
dataSource.description: Start date of the episode, if exists, else the start date of the spell.

dataSource.name: VisitStartTime
dataSource.description: Start time of the episode, if exists, else midnight.

omopColumns.query:
select distinct
				apc.NHSNumber,
				apc.HospitalProviderSpellNumber,
				cc.CriticalCareStartDate as VisitStartDate,
				coalesce(cc.CriticalCareStartTime, '000000') as VisitStartTime,
				cc.CriticalCarePeriodDischargeDate as VisitEndDate,
				coalesce(cc.CriticalCarePeriodDischargeTime, '000000') as VisitEndTime
		from omop_staging.sus_CCMDS cc
		inner join omop_staging.sus_APC apc on cc.GeneratedRecordID = apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier
		where apc.NHSNumber is not null

omopColumns.name: visit_detail_end_date

dataSource.name: VisitEndDate
dataSource.description: End date of the episode, if exists, else the spell discharge date, if exists, else the message date.

omopColumns.query:
select distinct
				apc.NHSNumber,
				apc.HospitalProviderSpellNumber,
				cc.CriticalCareStartDate as VisitStartDate,
				coalesce(cc.CriticalCareStartTime, '000000') as VisitStartTime,
				cc.CriticalCarePeriodDischargeDate as VisitEndDate,
				coalesce(cc.CriticalCarePeriodDischargeTime, '000000') as VisitEndTime
		from omop_staging.sus_CCMDS cc
		inner join omop_staging.sus_APC apc on cc.GeneratedRecordID = apc.GeneratedRecordIdentifier
		where apc.NHSNumber is not null

omopColumns.operation_description: Combines a date with a time of day.

dataSource.name: VisitEndDate

dataSource.name: VisitEndTime

omopColumns.name: visit_detail_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Constant value set to `581379`. `Inpatient Critical Care Facility`

omopColumns.name: visit_detail_type_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Constant value set to `32818`. `EHR administration record`
